messages.title: YOUR BILL FOR THE COST OF CORBYN
messages.content: To be paid by: hardworking taxpayers like you

mentions.tacticalSituation: Conservatives were only nine seats short of a majority. Newcastle under Lyme is one of the seats the Conservatives need to gain for us to secure a majority government. Only 96 people need to change their minds ...
